backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data types and CRUD operations for videos, events, gallery items, releases, tracks, artist profiles, user profiles, and subscription plans with access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend feature updates to the specific source files and components involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file including pages, hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document with a root div and script entrypoint for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theming, query client, layout, and all page routes including plans.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Gall: Admin UI for creating, editing, and deleting gallery items with image upload and progress handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Plan: Admin interface for creating, updating, and deleting user subscription plans with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Prof: Form UI for editing artist profile fields including name, bio, and social links, with save and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Rele: Admin interface to create, edit, and delete releases and their tracks, including cover uploads and streaming links.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Show: Admin tool for managing events, allowing creation, editing, and deletion of show entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/forms/Vide: Admin UI for managing video entries with add, edit, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login, logout, and account creation via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter their name and save a basic profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Overall site layout with navigation, footer, and automatic profile setup dialog for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteNav.t: Responsive site navigation bar with admin-aware links, desktop and mobile menus, and login button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: Provides admin CRUD mutation hooks for profile, releases, tracks, videos, events, gallery items, and plans with cache invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing login state, identity loading, and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks for fetching profile, media items, events, gallery, user data, admin status, and plans using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider around the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page gating access by identity and admin status, showing content management tabs and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery grid of images with captions, loading skeletons, and a modal for viewing selected images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows an artist hero section, social links, and about section using fetched profile data with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Fetches and displays user subscription plans with authentication, loading, and error states, allowing plan selection.
frontend/src/pages/ReleasesPage.tsx: Renders music releases with cover art, dates, tracks, and platform links, including loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ShowsPage.tsx: Lists upcoming events sorted by date with venue details, ticket links, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Shows a grid of videos with titles and external watch links, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/platformLinks.tsx: Maps URLs to streaming or social platform labels and icons using string matching with a fallback option.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, requirements, and existing features for building a music artist site with admin tools and public pages.
